summary_gpt: PVR INOX has opened its first Director’s Cut luxury multiplex in Noida at DLF Mall of India, featuring advanced technology, plush seating, and exclusive experiences, strengthening its premium cinema footprint across India. The new multiplex offers a high-end cinematic experience with state-of-the-art screens, immersive sound, and luxurious amenities, reinforcing PVR INOX's leadership in the premium segment.

PVR INOX Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 12, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2025. The trading window for insiders remains closed until 48 hours after the results are announced.

PVR INOX has opened its first multiplex in Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, featuring four themed auditoriums with advanced cinema technology, marking its largest network expansion to 1,738 screens across 352 properties. The company continues to leverage its FOCO model to expand into Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities, emphasizing quality and rapid growth.

PVR INOX has opened two new multiplexes in Gurugram and Raipur, expanding its network to 1,734 screens across 351 properties, with a focus on premium and innovative cinema experiences. The new properties feature state-of-the-art technology and unique offerings like the 'Cine Café' and Luxe auditoriums, reinforcing its leadership in urban and emerging markets.
